define Register a new action so other modules can attach to this action in your code

Exceptions:

Parameters:
string$notification
Returns:
void
Author:
Matt Brewer
static execute ( $  notification ) [static]

execute Called by the system to execute associated functions that requested to be called The return value is the result of the called functions. For a chain of functions attached to one hook, the result returned by the first function is passed in to the next function, etc - the hook returns the last value, allowing developers to "refine" the return value.

Exceptions:
InvalidNotificationException
Parameters:
string$notification
...va_args
Returns:
mixed $function_return_value
Author:
Matt Brewer
